title: ModelManifest
description: Per-model manifest with download URLs, file sizes, and integrity checksums.

model_id.description: Unique model identifier matching the catalog entry.

revision.description: Source revision hash (e.g., git commit SHA) for reproducibility.

files.description: List of files to download for this model.

ModelFile.description: A single file in the model distribution.

path.description: Relative file path within the model directory.

urls.description: Ordered list of download mirror URLs. Tried in order with fallback on failure.

size_bytes.description: Expected file size in bytes, verified after download.

sha256.description: Hex-encoded SHA-256 hash of the file content, verified after download.
